AltTeaser.name: AltTeaser0
AltTeaser.content: OpenCms 9.5 introduced new roles with fewer rights than workplace users. The role system is adjusted to the improved ADE features. There are roles like "Element author" and "Editor" that do not have access to the traditional workplace at all.

Topic.AltHeading: Containers: Attach permissions and placeholders for empty containers.

AltTeaser.name: AltTeaser0
AltTeaser.content: OpenCms 9.5 adds the attribute editableby to the <cms:container> tag. Using it, you can specify which users are able to add or remove elements in a container. Moreover the <cms:container> tag can have a body. The body's HTML is shown in the container whenever it is empty.

Topic.AltHeading: Template models: Simplified creation and an extra option

AltTeaser.name: AltTeaser0
AltTeaser.content: Template models, formerly model pages, can now be added and edited via a special view in the sitemap editor. Moreover, for each content on a template model you can choose if it should be copied or reused on pages generated from the model.

AltTeaser.name: AltTeaser0
AltTeaser.content: Categories can now be edited via a special view in the sitemap editor.

AltTeaser.name: AltTeaser0
AltTeaser.content: Galleries can now be edited via a special view in the sitemap editor.
